topics.body:
So I have discovered that making an emblem for Lewis is very likely impossible (the way I do it anyways)

Well, at least in Advanced Warfare, now that I have it. I don't know if the different shapes in Black Ops 2 makes it possible or not, I haven't tried it there. But it looks like I won't be making the switch to Advanced Warfare after all :P

And can I just say that the Xbox One is gonna take a lot to get used to, it took me like 5 minutes to figure out how to turn it off before I just stood up and turned it off manually

topics.body:
Youtube's Gangnam Style got so many views that its 32-bit integer system couldn't handle it, so it froze for a bit.

"We never thought a video would be watched in numbers greater than a 32-bit integer (=2,147,483,647 views), but that was before we met PSY. "Gangnam Style" has been viewed so many times we had to upgrade to a 64-bit integer (9,223,372,036,854,775,808)!

Hover over the counter in "PSY's video":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9bZkp7q19f0 to see a little math magic and stay tuned for bigger and bigger numbers on YouTube."
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200
